articles.author: Corinne Heller
articles.title: Chris Evans & Alba Baptista marry in Marvel-ous Massachusetts wedding - NBC10 Boston
articles.description: The "Captain America" star married actress Alba Baptista Sept. 9 in an intimate ceremony at a private residence in Massachusetts, multiple outlets reported…
articles.content:
Originally appeared on E! Online
Surprise! Chris Evans is married.
The "Captain America" star married actress Alba Baptista Sept. 9 in an intimate ceremony at a private residence in Massachusetts, … [+2051 chars]
